title: AzureAnalysisServices
description: The Azure Analysis Services Web API provides a RESTful set of web services that enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete Analysis Services servers

fields.redirect_uri: The callback URL for your application

AnalysisServicesServer.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

AnalysisServicesServerMutableProperties.description: An object that represents a set of mutable Analysis Services resource properties.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of Analysis Services resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

serverFullName.description: The full name of the Analysis Services resource.

state.description: The current state of Analysis Services resource. The state is to indicate more states outside of resource provisioning.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

sku.description: The SKU of the Analysis Services resource.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional provisioning properties.

AnalysisServicesServers.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

value.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

BackupConfiguration.description: An object that represents backup configurations

accessKey.description: The access key of storage account used for backup configuration

blobContainer.description: The name of blob container for backup configuration

storageAccount.description: Storage account full resource id for backup configuration

Resource.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

id.description: An identifier that represents the Analysis Services resource.

location.description: Location of the Analysis Services resource.

name.description: The name of the Analysis Services resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the Analysis Services resource.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional resource provisioning properties.

type.description: The type of the Analysis Services resource.

ResourceSku.description: Represents the SKU name and Azure pricing tier for Analysis Services resource.

name.description: Name of the SKU level for the server being provisioned.

tier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

ServerAdministrators.description: An array of administrator user identities

members.description: An array of administrator user identities.

items.description: The UPN of the user. For example: johnsmith@contoso.com.

actions.title: Servers_List
actions.description: Lists all the Analysis Services servers for the given subscription.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Gets all the Analysis Services servers for the given resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_Delete
actions.description: Deletes the specified Analysis Services server.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_GetDetails
actions.description: Gets details about the specified Analysis Services server.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_Update
actions.description: Updates the current state of the specified Analysis Services server.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_Create
actions.description: Provisions the specified Analysis Services server based on the configuration specified in the request.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_Resume
actions.description: Resumes operation of the specified Analysis Services server instance.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: Servers_Suspend
actions.description: Supends operation of the specified Analysis Services server instance.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.

serverName.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

subscriptionId.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
